MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-DEC-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:24pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:06PM on Sunday 13 December 2020.
